events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me at all and I have not used it.
The issue was categorized as a Refund case based on the customer's request to return the jacket and get their money back.
The case was assigned to support agent Emily to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want a refund for your recent jacket purchase. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, I only tried it on once and there’s no damage or wear.
Thank you for the info! We can proceed with the refund. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send it back this week to get the refund.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The money should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything was handled to your satisfaction. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us, and we hope to assist you again in the future.
